channel.title: Ub34 l331 n3w $c41pt--the lazy mans auto login and more! Need feedback!99
channel.description: Ok just give me feedback, i did this while using a TUT [code] program cardboardcorn; begin Clickmouse(457,446,True) wait(50) sendkeys('pkpurewitch')//username here wait(100) SendKeysVb('{ENTER}',false) wait(100) sendkeys('imafatty')//password here wait(100) Clickmouse(300,483,True) wait(3000) clickmouse(389,495,true) sendkeys('i eat babies for a living') SendKeysVb('{ENTER}',false) wait(100) Writeln('u successfully logged in u lazy ass noob') end.[/code]

item.title: Ub34 l331 n3w $c41pt--the lazy mans auto login and more! Need feedback!99
item.dc:creator: @deathbyvirus deathbyvirus
item.description:
@deathbyvirus wrote:

[quote=“arr0w, post:7, topic:6371”]not bad but try this

[scar]program cardboardcorn;
const
username=‘pkpurwitch’//username here
password=‘imafatty’//password here
begin
Clickmouse(457,446,True)
wait(50)
sendkeys(‘username’)//username here
wait(100)
SendKeysVb(’{ENTER}’,false)
wait(100)
sendkeys(‘password’)//password here
wait(100)
Clickmouse(300,483,True)
wait(3000)
clickmouse(389,495,true)
sendkeys(‘i eat babies for a living’)
SendKeysVb(’{ENTER}’,false)
wait(100)
Writeln(‘u successfully logged in u lazy ass noob’)
end.[/scar][/quote]
if you do it that way u don’t actually need the const then, you can make the setup work a lot easier and quicker if u just took out the ‘…’ things that are around the username and password that aren’t in the const, except for the ‘{ENTER}’ ones

sendkeys(‘i eat babies for a living’)

wait(100)
Writeln(‘u successfully logged in u lazy ass noob’)
end.[/scar]

item.title: Ub34 l331 n3w $c41pt--the lazy mans auto login and more! Need feedback!99
item.dc:creator: @Surajd Surajd
item.description:
@Surajd wrote:

[scar]Program LogInRS2_by_Surajd;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

Var a, b, Logged, Login : Integer;

Const
SDusername = ‘’;
SDpassword = ‘’;

Procedure LoadImages;
begin

Logged := DTMFromString(‘78DA63DCCCC8C0A008C448E0FFFFFF601A26C’ +
‘A780CC8FAC18015C0D52C05B27E31A09983A6A601D31C47675F54’ +
‘35FB812C1502EE5981A9C6C32B04450D00F097111D’);

Login := BitmapFromString(42, 20, ‘z78DAED96C90D002008C0567’ +
‘20AF61FC9F8E383C180C4A37D2A418B91D01A000C44813BEEB8BF’ +
‘7D93D513C5202BDE9F215E257F1E2BB2725DEFC62B70977BEE1FC’ +
‘11D774F3FC9EA7527B83351E05EE3F8CFBBEF984900604E076056’ +
‘F09A’);

end;

Procedure LogInSD;
begin
if(FindDTM(logged, a, b, 0, 0, 1024, 768))then
begin
Mouse(a, b, 3, 1, true);
wait( 1000 + Random( 200 * 4 ));
Mouse(375, 257, 1, 2, true);
Sendkeys(SDusername + chr( 13 ));
wait( 1000 + Random( 100 * 5 ));
Sendkeys(SDpassword);
wait( 1501 + Random( 200 * 1 / 2));
if (FindBitmapToleranceIn(login, a, b, 0, 0, 1024, 768, 3)) then
Mouse(a, b, 1, 1, true);
wait( 10000 + Random( 200 * 2 / 1 + 1));
Mouse(391, 340, 0, 0, true);
wait( 4000 + Random( 301 * 2 / 1 - 100 ));
end;
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
LoadImages;
LogInSD;
end.[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Ub34 l331 n3w $c41pt--the lazy mans auto login and more! Need feedback!99
item.dc:creator: @Mad_Cow Mad Cow
item.description:
@Mad_Cow wrote:

[quote=“cardboardcorn, post:1, topic:6371”]Ok just give me feedback, i did this while using a TUT

program cardboardcorn; begin Clickmouse(457,446,True) wait(50) sendkeys('pkpurewitch')//username here wait(100) SendKeysVb('{ENTER}',false) wait(100) sendkeys('imafatty')//password here wait(100) Clickmouse(300,483,True) wait(3000) clickmouse(389,495,true) sendkeys('i eat babies for a living') SendKeysVb('{ENTER}',false) wait(100) Writeln('u successfully logged in u lazy ass noob') end.[/quote]

Perhaps use bitmaps.
Here it is with the code cleaned
[scar]program cardboardcorn;
begin
ClickMouse(457, 446, True)
Wait(50)
SendKeys(‘pkpurewitch’)//username here
Wait(100)
SendKeysVb(’{ENTER}’,false)
Wait(100)
SendKeys(‘imafatty’)//password here
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(300,483,True)
Wait(3000)
ClickMouse(389,495,true)
SendKeys(‘i eat babies for a living’)
SendKeysVb(’{ENTER}’,false)
Wait(100)
WriteLn(‘u successfully logged in u lazy ass noob’)
end.[/scar]

And also you could add “const” with Username and Pass to give the users more flexibiliy and perhaps even procedures.

Eg.[scar]program cardboardcorn;

const
Username = ‘Username here’;//username here
Password = ‘Password here’;//password here

procedure Login;
begin
ClickMouse(457, 446, True)
Wait(50)
SendKeys(Username)
Wait(100)
SendKeysVb(’{ENTER}’,false)
Wait(100)
SendKeys(Password)
Wait(100)
ClickMouse(300,483,True)
Wait(3000)
ClickMouse(389,495,true)
SendKeys(‘i eat babies for a living’)
SendKeysVb(’{ENTER}’,false)
Wait(100)
WriteLn(‘u successfully logged in u lazy ass noob’)
end;

begin
Login;
end.[/scar]

Also try a more humanlike mouse like BenMouse

Hope this helped,
Mad Cow

Read full topic
